resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158327</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158327</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3200</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">An Independent English Learning Center</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Unabhängige Englische Erlernenmitte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Centre D'Étude Anglais Indépendant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Centro De Aprendizagem Inglês Independente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Centro Imparante Inglese Indipendente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα ανεξάρτητο αγγλικό κέντρο εκμάθησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Centro Que aprende Inglés Independiente</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A description of the way in which an elementary English teacher set up am Independent English Learning Center where students work during designated hours of the school week/ English lessons on Workcards, Reading and other activities according to graduated levels.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">educational aids</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Beschreibung der Methode, in der ein 
grundlegender englischer Lehrer morgens unabhängige englische 
erlernenmitte aufstellte, wo Kursteilnehmer während der 
gekennzeichneten Stunden der Schulewoche englischen Lektionen auf 
Workcards, Messwert und anderen Aktivitäten entsprechend abgestuften 
Stufen arbeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une description de la façon dont un centre 
d'étude anglais indépendant anglais élémentaire de l'installation 
AM de professeur où les étudiants travaillent pendant des heures 
indiquées des leçons anglaises de semaine d'école sur Workcards, 
lecture et d'autres activités selon les niveaux gradués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma descrição da maneira em que um professor 
inglês elementar ajustou acima o centro de aprendizagem inglês 
independente do am onde os estudantes trabalham durante horas 
designadas das lições inglesas da semana da escola em Workcards, em 
leitura e em outras atividades de acordo com níveis graduados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una descrizione del modo in quale un centro 
imparante inglese indipendente di di messa a punto elementare 
dell'insegnante inglese dove gli allievi lavorano durante le ore 
indicate delle lezioni inglesi di settimana della scuola su Workcards,
su lettura e su altre attività secondo i livelli graduati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια περιγραφή του τρόπου με τον οποίο ένας 
στοιχειώδης αγγλικός δάσκαλος οργάνωσε το ανεξάρτητο αγγλικό 
κέντρο εκμάθησης AM όπου οι σπουδαστές εργάζονται κατά τη 
διάρκεια των οριζόμενων ωρών της σχολικής εβδομάδας/των αγγλικών
μαθημάτων σε Workcards, την ανάγνωση και άλλες δραστηριότητες 
σύμφωνα με τα κλιμακωτά επίπεδα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una descripción de la manera de la cual un 
profesor inglés elemental instaló el centro que aprendía inglés 
Independiente de la donde los estudiantes trabajan durante las horas 
señaladas de las lecciones inglesas de la semana de la escuela en 
Workcards, la lectura y otras actividades según niveles graduados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenstrategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pädagogische Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">aides éducatives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dae (dispositivo automático de entrada) educacionais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie di apprendimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sussidi educativi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατηγικές εκμάθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαιδευτικές ενισχύσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias que aprenden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ayudas educativas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>

            </role>

        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3200</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>

          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

            <value>other</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          <context>

        </educational>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">ETNI _English Teachers Network in Israel</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            <taxon>

        </classification>
        <classification>

              </entry>

        </classification>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>718</id>

                <string language="en">learning</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
